projects.description: Led a large-scale migration from legacy network to SDA fabric at Hoag Hospital, Irvine campus.
highlights: Migrated thousands of endpoints into SDA fabric
Created Anycast Gateways and new VLAN pools
Integrated Cisco ISE with DNA Center (pxGrid)
projects.title: Cisco SDA Brownfield to Greenfield Migration

projects.description: Developed lightweight automation scripts and Flask-based tools to streamline SDA operations and health checks.
highlights: Automated switch onboarding and health validation
Built Flask dashboards for quick config access
projects.title: Python-Based Network Automation

projects.description: Optimized LAN/WAN and SIP voice/data services with secure segmentation and Infoblox IPAM integration.
highlights: Configured Infoblox DHCP/DNS for new pools
Integrated Palo Alto Panorama for security monitoring
projects.title: Voice/Data Services Optimization

responsibilities: 🧩 Designed and migrated large-scale hospital networks into Cisco SDA fabric, leveraging IS-IS for fabric underlay and Anycast Gateway deployment.
🌐 Configured advanced routing protocols (IS-IS, OSPF, BGP) across SDA fabric edge, control-plane nodes, and intermediate nodes to ensure seamless integration with legacy WAN/Internet.
🔀 Implemented Layer 2/3 segmentation with scalable group tags (SGTs) and enforced security policies across 1,000+ endpoints using Cisco ISE + pxGrid integration.
⚡ Engineered and optimized switch stack deployments (Cisco Catalyst 9300/9500/9600) with StackWise Virtual and HSRP-to-Anycast migration, ensuring high availability.
📡 Troubleshot complex forwarding issues including FEC CL74 vs CL108 mismatches, asymmetric routing in SDA fabric, and PoE limitations on rugged IE3300 switches.
🚀 Automated DNAC provisioning workflows with Jinja2 templates and Python scripts, reducing deployment time by 35% and eliminating manual configuration errors.
🔐 Integrated Infoblox DHCP/DNS with SDA fabric IP pools, streamlining IPAM operations and ensuring consistent endpoint onboarding across greenfield/brownfield sites.
🛡️ Implemented multi-vendor visibility by integrating Palo Alto Panorama for traffic filtering and advanced security posture enforcement within SDA.
📘 Authored detailed design docs and playbooks (ISEC) for VLAN renumbering, SDA migration steps, and underlay troubleshooting, enabling repeatable processes for future rollouts.
🤝 Partnered with cross-functional clinical IT and vendor teams to execute SDA migrations in production hospital environments with **zero downtime**.
